name: Sore Knees
description:
You have sore knees, it hurts to jump

---

Controls:

W/Space = Jump

A/Left Arrow = Move Left

D/Right Arrow = Move Right

*and obviously, left mouse click to click buttons*

---

Made for Mini Jam, I wanted to try and use the theme but I couldn't think of anything, so I just stuck with the limitation which is "Movement is Lethal"

I decided to go with the generic platformer but each jump hurts you.

---

Currently, there are 3 levels, I might add more but idk

---

Note: kinda laggy when you first start it, but it gets fine after a few seconds
